column5: Had the opportunity to meet the team at @Singtel today! It was great to discuss all that we’re doing together - and all of the potential new areas for collaboration - thank you for your continued partnership with @cisco! https://t.co/uMKuPVZu5H

Great discussion with Singapore Minister for Communications and Information @joteo_ylm about the
nation’s digital transformation ambitions. Looking forward to deepening our partnership with the
Singapore government to create an inclusive and sustainable digital society. https://t.co/c1ZbztpB3v

Started our second day in Singapore meeting with @GovTechSG! It was great to learn more about how the Singapore government is using technology to better the lives of citizens. Thank you for having us! https://t.co/J1ksjXepNa
Arrived in Singapore today and kicked off the visit with a great meeting with the team at HTX! Thanks for your ongoing partnership with @Cisco! @markpatt https://t.co/3Kmjuh7UeA

My heart is with the people of Turkey and Syria and all those impacted by the tragic earthquake. The @Cisco Foundation has launched a matching campaign to support local disaster relief organizations, and our Incident Management Team is monitoring the situation and ready to help.

Tokyo is a digital transformation leader on the world stage, and it was a privilege to meet with Governor @ecoyuri to discuss her digital vision. @Cisco is proud to partner with Tokyo to ensure all citizens benefit from a digital, secure, and inclusive future. @markpatt https://t.co/s3W8j6QLb7
It was a pleasure meeting Yoshida-san and the @Sony team today to discuss their goals for the future and our ongoing partnership. Thank you for having us! https://t.co/NSOQHCSmlZ

Wrapped up a fantastic first day in Tokyo meeting with Sawada-san and the team at @GlobalNTT! Thanks, as always, for the commitment to our partnership. I'm excited about all we can continue to do together. https://t.co/5qgubiUDnM

Thrilled to see all the incredible innovation our @Cisco teams are sharing this week at #CiscoEMEA! From our new cloud management tools for industrial #IoT, to @thousandeyes support for OpenTelemetry and updates to Cisco+ Secure Connect, there’s a lot to be excited about!

Loved spending time with our amazing @Cisco Japan team this afternoon! Thank you for the fantastic performance, the great energy, and the insightful questions! I’m thrilled to be back in APJC! @ciscoapac @markpatt @davidstevenwest @nakagawa_ichiro https://t.co/WyCjHhhsgJ

Always great seeing @hmikitani_e and the team at @RakutenGroup! Thanks for hosting us today. We’re thankful for your ongoing partnership with @cisco, and it’s great to see the results of the work we’ve been driving together! https://t.co/tLESLsIo8e

Great meeting today with @ToyotaMotorCorp and @WovenPlanet_GL in Tokyo! Thank you for hosting us and sharing more about your vision for city digital transformation and the future of mobility. Looking forward to continuing to partner together! @ciscoapac https://t.co/DxRrE7Jo7r

Had a fantastic start to my trip to Tokyo meeting with many of our top Japanese partners! Thank you for sharing your insightful questions and for a great discussion this morning. @ciscoapac @markpatt @davidstevenwest @nakagawa_ichiro https://t.co/fxzjGz0y0O
Congratulations, @MariniMartinez! This is such an incredible honor and one you should be proud of. I know you will have an amazing impact on the NSTAC and represent @Cisco well!

#LunarNewYear should be full of promise for the year, but we again witnessed a horrific act of violence on innocent victims celebrating one of life’s precious moments. My heart goes out to all impacted. We must do all we can to stop the violence. #StopAAPIHate
Great work by @ciscoemerge on API security

Finished off an incredible week meeting with our @Cisco Denmark team in the Copenhagen office! Thanks for having me and for the great questions - it’s always fantastic being back in person with our teams! @markpatt @JeffSharritts https://t.co/TAoJnKaSyh

Was great to meet Danish Minister for Digitalization and Gender Equality @marie_bjerre. Denmark is a digital transformation trailblazer in the EU, and @Cisco is looking forward to helping the government advance its digital vision and enable greater inclusion and equality. https://t.co/XG3LRLDbXg

It was great to meet @AshwiniVaishnaw today at @WEF and hear the government's vision for #DigitalIndia. @Cisco is proud to partner with India on technologies that can drive economic growth, social inclusion, and innovation. #WEF23 https://t.co/SnjaeURZ9d

Enjoyed meeting Japanese Digital Minister @konotaromp while at #WEF23. Japan's Digital Agency is
ushering in a new digital era for the country, and @Cisco looks forward to supporting the government's efforts to bring the benefits of digitization to all of Japan's citizens. https://t.co/YlycGsD9Tl

It's always an honor to catch up with Luxembourg Prime Minister @Xavier_Bettel at @WEF. Luxembourg's digital vision is ambitious, and Cisco is excited to continue our work with the government to bolster cybersecurity, advance sustainability, and promote digital skills. #WEF23 https://t.co/ftW0yl5Kv1

Today we honor the life and legacy of Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and commemorate his incredible dedication to equality and justice. He continues to be an inspiration to us all, and we know the work he started is not yet done. #MLKDay
Welcome to #TeamCisco, Cameron! We’re excited to have you on the team!
Wishing a very Merry Christmas to everyone celebrating today around the world! I hope you all have a wonderful day celebrating with family and friends.
#HappyHanukkah to everyone beginning their celebrations around the world! Chag Sameach!
So happy to see my friend, Bryan Stevenson, delivering keynote at UNC graduation!

At @Cisco, we know that being driven by purpose is good for business and good for the world. Today, we’re sharing our 2022 #CiscoPurposeReport which highlights the actions we've taken and progress we've made to Power a More Inclusive Future for All: https://t.co/OWiBNRBT9K

.@Cisco surveyed #cybersecurity professionals around the world, and nearly two-thirds said their business experienced a breach that jeopardized business operations. Learn more about the importance of security resilience in our new Security Outcomes Report: https://t.co/o9Obt4OEdl
I'm in - let's get it together!!!!
Happy #Thanksgiving to all who are celebrating today! I hope you all have a fantastic day filled with family and friends, good food, and gratitude.

Today on #VeteransDay we honor all who have selflessly served our country and devoted themselves to protecting us and our freedom. A special shout out to our many @Cisco employees who are also military veterans - we're proud to have you on our team & thank you for your service!
We are thrilled to partner with you all!
@emilychangtv Congrats, @emilychangtv - this is what truly matters in life!  (and congrats on the new gig, too 😀)

Honored to meet with President @sanchezcastejon and announce our plan to launch a center for the design and prototyping of next generation semiconductor devices in Spain. @Cisco is committed to contributing knowledge and experience to help grow the European chips ecosystem.

Had a fantastic trip to @CiscoSaudia earlier this week! I enjoyed reconnecting with members of our team there, as well as many of our @Cisco customers. It was great to be back and witness the exciting momentum in Saudi. https://t.co/VMJ1v3xuMQ

This week I had the honor of meeting Buthayna Al-Wehaibi, the first female in Saudi Arabia to earn her Cisco CCIE back in 2009. Now she’s working for Cisco as a Country Services Business Manager - such an inspiring story! @CiscoSaudia https://t.co/Uro4Hr1Htt

Hybrid work and security are more critical to customers than ever, and our teams are doing great work to deliver incredible innovation. Thanks for sharing with our @CiscoPartners at #PS22, @jpatel41! https://t.co/rntzm8xGB1
Next up, @jonathandavidsn shares how we plan to transform our customers’ infrastructure with simplicity! @CiscoPartners #PS22 https://t.co/3OetTbid0d
Applications are critical to our customers and experience is everything. Thanks for sharing our application and FSO strategies with our @CiscoPartners, @lizcentoni! #PS22 https://t.co/jbbWzdobSZ
Excited to be back together with many of our incredible @CiscoPartners for #PS22! Thanks for kicking things off @Tuszik! https://t.co/zN6k4Cn62m

Such a great visit with @CiscoPoland! The work you do and the way you come together to support one another is truly an inspiration. I am so glad I had the chance to visit with you and hope to see many of you again soon! https://t.co/8cDygaKDXd

Thank you General @MolendaKarol of the Polish Cyber Command, I’m excited about the cooperation between Cisco @TalosSecurity and @CyberWojska to identify, research, and document advanced threats and protect Poland’s critical infrastructure @CiscoPoland https://t.co/XpYxphqqON
Thank you @Cisco Israel for a great visit! Love the innovation being driven by all of you! https://t.co/BDRmDhWmJ5
Thank you @alonabaron! I enjoyed our discussion! https://t.co/JzdpBGAXks
Happy #Diwali to all who are celebrating around the world!
How good is this?

We’re incredibly proud of @CiscoNetAcad's impact over 25 years, serving 17.5M learners in 190 countries. This program truly brings our purpose to life, and we’re excited to share our goal to train 25M more learners over the next 10 years: https://t.co/ZjjBqQIuoj
And congrats to @FranKatsoudas for being the first-ever recipient of the #GPTW Equity for All award! So well-deserved! https://t.co/Oel7SeAyq9

Great to be in Orlando today for the @GPTW_US For All Summit with so many amazing individuals and leaders committed to inclusivity and equity. Also proud to be celebrating another year of @Cisco in the Top 3 of #GPTW’s #WorldsBestWorkplaces! https://t.co/bldnEkgowi

Proud to see @Cisco at #3 on the first-ever American Opportunity Index! It’s incredible to be recognized alongside other large companies dedicated to our employees’ career growth and advancement. https://t.co/fOD8Bax59v

Today we’re giving our customers more choice in how they do hybrid work. Excited to share we’re partnering with @Microsoft to bring Microsoft Teams to @Cisco Meeting Room devices: https://t.co/WgWBhKtyrg

Today is #WorldMentalHeathDay, an important reminder of the work left to do to to end the stigma surrounding mental health. At @Cisco, we strive to create an inclusive environment where our employees can talk openly and support one another because mental health is health.

On this #IndigenousPeoplesDay, we recognize the many contributions of the Native American communities across the US and their ongoing strength and resilience. We must continue to celebrate and honor those who were here long before us.

Congratulations to @FranKatsoudas for being named to the @Forbes 50 Over 50 Entrepreneurs list! I can’t think of anyone more deserving! Thanks, as always, for all you do for @Cisco to drive our business and our purpose strategy around the globe!! https://t.co/RGRAI8oNdo
So proud of all that @jenloving23 and @DSTNHome are doing to create more housing....
Shana Tova - Happy #RoshHashanah to all who are celebrating around the world! Wishing you a good and sweet new year!
Love this! @Cisco is committing $5M to @BlkEconAlliance to help advance the incredible work they’re doing to help Black entrepreneurs from Atlanta-based HBCUs. https://t.co/6EOvP3AsQb
Today we remember the lives lost 21 years ago on September 11 and honor the brave heroes and first responders who made sacrifices that day to help others. We will never forget.

My heart goes out to the Royal Family and everyone affected by the passing of Her Majesty the Queen. Her steadfast leadership through historic times leaves a lasting legacy that will forever be remembered. Rest in peace.

.@Cisco is proud to support @CommerceGov's #IPEF Upskilling Initiative with the expertise & resources of our @CiscoNetAcad program. This partnership will empower women in the Indo-Pacific region with digital skills and create possibilities in jobs that power the digital economy.

Congrats on a fantastic first #CiscoImpact as the leader of our global sales & marketing team, @JeffSharritts! We truly have the best team in the business, and it was amazing to be back in Vegas after 3 years away. I’m so excited about what’s ahead for @cisco and this team! https://t.co/ZRD1jQo7yD

Thanks for joining us to wrap up an incredible 3 days back in Vegas for #CiscoImpact, @Simone_Biles! Your amazing story of bravery and grit and your reminders about what it takes to win were just what we needed to get our team ready for the year ahead!! https://t.co/0HTrNBWfad
Proud to partner with you, @StephenCurry30 - your focus on helping those in your community is incredible!
Love this.  Congrats to @KamaiuJohnson for gaining his tour card for the PGA Tour LatinoAmerica!  We are proud of you!
Who is IU?
Facts.
Whatever it takes....
Glad to see you back out there!

I’m excited to welcome @sarahraemurphy to @Cisco’s Board of Directors. Sarah’s accomplishments and track record will help us shape Cisco’s strategy and I look forward to her many contributions! Read more: https://t.co/Uf4fq6EVrp
@Stephanie_Link Thank you, Stephanie!
Congrats, Andrew!
Congrats on the three-peat, @Cisco Australia! You should all be proud of the incredible culture you’ve created. Thanks so much for all you do, and keep up the amazing work! @GPTW_Australia
Love it!
Proud to partner with such an amazing organization!

The #CHIPSAct will help re-establish the US as a semiconductor manufacturing leader, promote supply chain resiliency, bolster competitiveness, & enhance Open RAN 5G efforts. Cisco applauds @POTUS' signing of the bill & the bipartisan work in Congress that made passage possible.

Thank you for your incredible leadership and contributions to @Cisco, @tnight! I’m so proud of all you’ve achieved during your time with us. Wishing you all the best as you enter the next phase of your career!
Awesome to see one of our #TeamCisco golfers, Viktor, at our @Cisco office in his home country of Norway! Thanks for showing him all our incredible @Webex products, @KjesbuSnorre!
Glad you are here!!!!!  @GoHeels
Great choice, @SecRaimondo
So proud to see @Cisco at #1 on @GPTW_US's list of Best Workplaces for Millennials for the 3rd year in a row!! #WeAreCisco
Thanks for your leadership and partnership @DSTNHome & @jenloving23 and thanks for all that you do! We all must play a role in ending homelessness
Well said, @darrenwalker. While our nation is far from perfect, we cannot stop believing that we can be better. We can harness the adversity we each face into fighting for progress.
Happy #4thOfJuly to everyone celebrating in the US today! Wishing you all a safe holiday with family and friends.
Congrats, @didemoto - so well deserved!

Incredible to see this housing complex where we broke ground in Dec 2019, and honored to hear from residents how their lives have changed by having a home. Thank you @DSTNHome and @abode_services for allowing @Cisco to be a part of this journey, but so much more to do. https://t.co/p29LXlCpkE

#Juneteenth is an important celebration of the emancipation of Black Americans, but it’s also a reminder that there’s so much more to do for true equality and an inclusive future for all. @Cisco is proud to celebrate and recognize this historic day with our employees.
Being a dad is the most amazing and rewarding job! Happy #FathersDay to all the incredible dads around the world - especially the dads of @Cisco!
We agree!  Thanks for spending time with us, @zkerravala
Wrapping up another amazing keynote with a conversation between @carriepsandstad and @mindykaling! Such a great discussion filled with inspiration and humor!! #CiscoLive https://t.co/gHb5ARD4Lb
Now @ThimayaS takes the stage to share our focus in creating the best possible customer experience! #CiscoLive https://t.co/iYESqJ8SsI
Love all the #HybridWork innovation from @jpatel41 and @tnight! #CiscoLive https://t.co/slpUAfEDwR

Time for more innovation during Day 2 of #CiscoLive! @lizcentoni and @tim_szigeti introduce Calisti and Panoptica - two new cloud-native, API-first tools for faster and better application development. https://t.co/AjZ5LMIfsq

Thanks for joining me today at #CiscoLive, @Pharrell! You had such an amazing message for our customers and partners in the room, and we are thrilled that @Cisco is partnering with you on YELLOWHAB! @YELLOWORG https://t.co/xvU0kc9abA
Congratulations to our amazing @cisco_in team for being named #1 Best Place to Work in India by @GPTW_India! This honor is so well deserved - thanks for all you do! @Cisco

.@jonathandavidsn wrapped up our Day 1 Keynote talking about how connectivity will continue to transform every industry. The opportunity has never been greater to work toward closing the digital divide and extending connectivity and opportunity to everyone. https://t.co/pa3BEZt6KP

.@lizcentoni shares how @Cisco can help you create the best end-to-end application experiences! We’re so excited about @AppDynamics Cloud and how we’re extending the power of this platform to cloud-native apps. #CiscoLive https://t.co/ddfdf902Lh

.@tnight is just a little excited about cloud-managed Catalyst on the @meraki dashboard!! This incredible innovation has been years in the making, and we’re all thrilled to see this come to life! #CiscoLive https://t.co/G0UPCSr2uQ
Awesome job at your first in-person #CiscoLive, @jpatel41! Thank you for sharing the incredible vision for @Cisco Security Cloud with our customers and partners! https://t.co/MQwM3vxhHU

Thank you to my friend @jimfarley98 for joining me today at #CiscoLive to talk to our customers. It was great to hear your perspective on how technology is continuing to transform the auto industry and the amazing things we can make possible together! https://t.co/T4KxFxR762
So thrilled to be back in Vegas with 16000+ of our incredible @Cisco customers and partners for #CiscoLive! https://t.co/yDPW72TNkj

I’m thrilled that our @CiscoSecure team is unveiling @Cisco Security Cloud today at #RSAC. This innovation is truly a game-changer for our customers as they look to secure their multi-cloud environments with a single, cloud-delivered platform. https://t.co/UVdKYvb4Su @jpatel41

Congratulations @BillyHo_Golf on your great win at the @MemorialGolf tournament!  We love partnering with you to advance the @APGA_Tour! Congrats also to my friend @aneelb and @Workday for an amazing first year as presenting sponsor!
Congrats @bobolwig - well deserved - thanks for being such a role model!
@BillyHo_Golf @MemorialGolf Good luck Sunday, @BillyHo_Golf !!!
Congratulations to our @Cisco Mexico team for being named #1 on @GPTW_Mexico's Best Workplaces for the 5th year in a row! What an incredible accomplishment - thanks for all you do! @CiscoLatam

On #MemorialDay, we take time to honor and remember the brave men and women who lost their lives for our country and our freedom. Thank you for your service, your selflessness, and for making the ultimate sacrifice.
Truth. We need Congress to act.  It is clear our current plan is NOT working.  Let’s do something to save our communities and our children.

Always great to catch up with my friend, @Xavier_Bettel! @Cisco and Luxembourg have a longstanding partnership, and we are excited about our work with the government to help Luxembourg achieve its digital vision. #WEF22

Thank you for your leadership and vision, Prime Minister @sanchezcastejon. It was great to see you again! @Cisco looks forward to continuing to partner with you to help you achieve Spain’s ambitious digital transformation goals!

Really enjoyed my afternoon at #GCNOW! Had a great panel discussion with @Hughcevans and @vonderleyen, moderated by @morningmika who helped us cover incredibly important topics, while keeping us laughing in between! @GlblCtzn https://t.co/Fh4VJaIBZ0
Excited to join you and all the other incredible speakers for these important discussions, @hughcevans! #GlobalCitizenNow @Pharrell

I’m proud to share that @s_slate90 is the winner in the People category of the @WeQualGlobal Awards! Shari is passionate about WeQual’s mission to achieve true gender parity and so deserving of this honor! Congrats, Shari - thanks for all you do! https://t.co/XFOKvcVml0 @Cisco

Congratulations to our incredible @Cisco team in Vietnam for being named #1 on the inaugural #BestWorkplaces in Vietnam list! What an incredible honor - thank you for all you do for Cisco, our customers, our partners, and each other! #GPTW @ciscoapac
Congratulations, @MariniMartinez! This honor is well-deserved, and I’m so glad you’re part of our @Cisco team! https://t.co/MHC78f5CW1

It's more important than ever to bridge the gap between technology and the public good by focusing on #PublicInterestTech. I'm thankful for the opportunity to work on this @SSIReview piece with my friend @DarrenWalker of @FordFoundation: https://t.co/wJI4CrN2uo

Our teams have been working incredibly hard to design technology to help IT teams learn, predict, and avoid network disruptions. Today, we’re introducing @Cisco Predictive Networks, and I’m excited for what this innovation will make possible in the future! https://t.co/o0SARzlMYo

I’m incredibly proud of @Cisco’s latest partnership supporting the @AGPA_Tour, furthering our commitment to powering an inclusive future in golf. I’m also thrilled that we are adding 4 new ambassadors from the APGA - Welcome to #TeamCisco! ⛳ https://t.co/J54OKhkVjt
Congratulations to our amazing team in Canada!

On #EarthDay we reflect on the importance of taking action to fight climate change & protect our planet for future generations. I’m incredibly proud of the work @Cisco does to be sustainable - including our commitment to reach #NetZero emissions - but there's so much more to do.
Proud that @Cisco is partnering with @GM to make the future of transportation safer and more sustainable!
Happy Easter to all of those celebrating today.  Let's pray for peace on this day of hope.
Chag Sameach! Happy #Passover to everyone celebrating around the world.

Loved spending time this morning with the Early in Career @CiscoEMEAR South employees who are living and working remotely in Venice for the Venywhere program! Their stories are so inspiring, and I believe programs like this will help us define the future of #HybridWork! @Cisco https://t.co/msK8gOAPd9

I’m incredibly proud that @Cisco has again been named #1 on @FortuneMagazine’s 100 Best Companies to Work For! This reflects what I already know - the people at this company and our amazing culture are what make Cisco great! #100BestCos @GPTW_US https://t.co/9apNb5Ivuv

As the war and humanitarian crisis continue, over 12M people in Ukraine and the surrounding region are in need of aid. I’m proud to join @GlblCtzn’s #StandUpForUkraine campaign to call on others to get involved and support the many Ukrainians who need our help. Please join us. https://t.co/r7citR11x4
Congratulations to @CiscoFrance for earning the top spot on the @GPTW_France list! So proud to see another country where @Cisco is #1! Thank you to the entire France team for all that you do! #GPTW
Congratulations @HubertDavisUNC - look forward to decades more of your leadership.  Glad you are OUR coach!

So proud of you guys - @UNC_Basketball - no team in the country showed so much grit and determination - what you achieved this season will make you better in life!  Thank you for letting all of us be a part of your amazing run!
So proud of @UNC_Basketball and @HubertDavisUNC - great first year coach and amazing kids with huge hearts!  Let's go finish it Monday night!
Proud to be your partner!

Proud to see more #1 #GPTW awards for our @Cisco teams around the world! Congratulations to @CiscoPortugal for being #1 in back-to-back years and @CiscoItalia for the 7th year in a row - so well-deserved for both of these incredible teams!!
Our amazing @CiscoSaudia team was once again recognized as the #1 #BestWorkplace in Saudi Arabia! Congratulations to this entire team, and thanks for all you do for @Cisco! @gptw_me @CiscoMiddleEast

Another great win by @UNC_Basketball - from bubble team to the Final Four!  Great job - congrats @HubertDavisUNC and the entire team who refused to give up all year.  You all showed grit, determination and confidence.  So proud of every member of this team and the coaching staff!
Another great win by @UNC_Basketball - from bubble team to the Elite Eight!  Great job!
Thrilled that @Ford is partnering with @Cisco @Webex to bring seamless collaboration experiences into their electric vehicles! https://t.co/dlTDde9Sbj

Congratulations to @Cisco Ireland for being named #1 on the @GPTW_Ireland list for the 3rd year in a row! This is a huge testament to your dedication to our customers, partners and communities, as well as our culture! Thanks for all you do! @CiscoUKI
Congrats to the entire @Cisco Philippines team for being named #1 #BestWorkplace in the Philippines!  You should all be incredibly proud - thank you for all you do for Cisco! @ciscoapac #GPTW

Today, @Cisco announced that @Apple AirPlay will be integrated into the @Webex experience! This will help users collaborate seamlessly across our devices and others that they use every day. Another incredible innovation by this team - congrats! https://t.co/cg2UbKi5LQ @jpatel41

Each #InternationalWomensDay, we celebrate inspiring women and their many accomplishments. This year, it’s especially important to recognize the brave women of Ukraine who are fighting for their families and country. We stand with you today and everyday.

I’m heartbroken by the crisis happening in Ukraine. My heart is with the people there and all those impacted. The safety of our @Cisco colleagues and their families is our top priority, and we’ll continue to support them however we can. I stand with all those calling for peace.
I love this!  Congrats @jenloving23 and @DSTNHome - proud to be your partner!
Proud to partner with the @NFL https://t.co/vqUUKQNObT
Congrats to @socioevents for being the highest-ranked event management platform on @G2dotcom’s #BestSoftware2022 list! Well deserved, team - keep up the amazing work! @Webex @Cisco
Great news!
Let's go @UNC_Basketball !!
👏 Well deserved!

A strong network is essential to powering #HybridWork. I’m thrilled that @Cisco is introducing new networking innovations today, including Wi-Fi 6E access points, Private #5G for the enterprise as a managed service, & new Catalyst 9000X series switches: https://t.co/D17C0bD6K2

Excited to be at the #ATTProAm for today’s Million Dollar Hole in One event, presented by @Cisco! We’re thrilled to honor Thomas Keller and help support his commitment to environmental sustainability! https://t.co/Mgb4beiMKU

Today marks the beginning of #BlackHistoryMonth, a time to acknowledge and celebrate the many incredible achievements of the Black community. This month we also take time to reflect on the Black experience in our country and continue the fight for justice and equality for all.
Happy #LunarNewYear to everyone beginning their celebrations around the world! Wishing you health, happiness and prosperity throughout this #YearOfTheTiger!

I’m thrilled that @JeffSharritts will be @Cisco’s next Chief Customer and Partner Officer as @gerri_elliott announces her retirement. Let’s celebrate Gerri’s amazing impact and the exciting future we’ll have under Jeff’s leadership! Congrats to you both! https://t.co/FZy3A7WBIY
Congratulations, @daniellekang -- proud to have you on Team @Cisco!

“I know that love is ultimately the only answer to mankind’s problems.”

On #MLKDay we honor the legacy of Dr. King and his steadfast leadership in the fight for social justice. That fight continues today as we strive for true equality and a more inclusive, compassionate world.
Congrats @UGAfootballLive - it’s been a long time but proud of the team and happy for @UGAAthletics - #GoDawgs

Honored and excited for @Cisco and @Webex to help power groundbreaking innovation through Callisto with our great partners @LockheedMartin & @amazon for @NASA’s #Artemis mission – unleashing a new chapter of virtual experiences in space! https://t.co/o0o06ahtAv https://t.co/WfClWiAzBL
@ashpearlman Amen.
@PatrickMoorhead Congrats, Patrick!
@MariniMartinez Beautiful!
Merry Christmas to our incredible @Cisco employees, customers, partners and everyone celebrating around the world! Wishing you a joyous and safe holiday with family and friends!
So proud of our team!! “@Cisco @Webex is the only major UCaaS platform that met the criteria of providing ultra-secure communication and collaboration.” https://t.co/HXn4IU4PUv
Congrats @StephenCurry30 - proud of you and happy for you!  The best part is you’re an even better man off the court than you are on the court!
Honored to partner with you and @DSTNHome, @jenloving23! Proud of what we’ve accomplished together so far, and there’s so much more to do!
Our first-ever @Cisco Purpose Report is now live! I’m so proud of the incredible CSR and ESG work our teams are doing around the world! #CiscoPurposeReport
#HappyHanukkah to everyone beginning their celebrations around the world! Chag Sameach!

#HappyThanksgiving to everyone celebrating today! This year, as always, I am incredible thankful for our amazing @Cisco employees, customers, and partners around the globe. Wishing everyone a fantastic day filled with gratitude, family and friends!
We are thrilled to announce @Cisco's partnership with @dish to help bring #5G services to the enterprise! https://t.co/a54IcPoHdS

.@Cisco applauds @POTUS for signing the bipartisan Infrastructure Investment & Jobs Act which lays out a bold vision & provides critical investments in US #infrastructure, including much needed rural broadband. This is a key step towards building a more inclusive future for all.
Ouch.  Eagles win one game and I get this ..... :-)
Congrats to @NellyKorda on a great week and another 2021 win!
Your love of sports, @jpatel41, amazes me!
So proud of the work you all do!  Congratulations on so much success helping our Veterans! #VeteransDay

I’m also excited to share that today @Cisco was named #2 on @Mil_Friendly’s list of Military Friendly Employers. I am incredibly proud to work alongside so many heroes each day, and Cisco will continue to do all we can to support our military community and their families.
